participant_1.background:
My job allows me to be myself and be creative.
I'm an animal lover who spends my free time learning more about nature and the environment.
I do laundry every other week, but I wish I could do it more often.
I'm distant with my family, but I'd like to be closer to them.
i enjoy ice cream.

participant_2.background:
I took medication to help with my dust allergy so I could write my book.
my favorite music is country.
My phone will be out and ready to capture the best moments at the festival this weekend!
I once wrote a short story about the cop who pulled me over and read it to him while he was writing my ticket.
My pets are my best friends and they make me laugh every day.

content.text: Hello!
Hi! How are you doing today?
I'm doing great! What do you like to do for fun?
I love to write books, go to festivals, and hang out with my pets! What about you?
I love to learn more about nature and the environment. I also like to spend time with my pets and go ice skating.
That's awesome! I've always wanted to learn more about nature and the environment. I love ice skating too!
Me too! It's so much fun. What kind of pets do you have?
I have a dog and a cat. They're both best friends and they make me laugh every day.
That's great! I love animals. I have a cat and a fish. They're both really good friends.
It sounds like you have a lot of fun with your pets!
Yes, I do! They're the best companions.
They definitely make life more fun!
I agree!
What are some of your favorite things about nature?
I love the way it makes me feel. It's so peaceful and relaxing. I also love learning about all the different plants and animals that live in it.
Me too! I love going for walks in the woods and just taking in all the beauty.
That's awesome! I love doing that too.
It's so peaceful.
I know right?
I feel like I can forget about everything when I'm in nature.
Me too! It's the best.
I'm glad we have something in common.
Me too! It's always nice to meet someone who shares your interests.
Yeah, it is!
